name: FLY2K
description:
FLY2K is currently in the final stages of development. The current build is available for demonstration only. The game's final release will be available by the end of 2018 for Windows only.

Description:
In FLY2K, you play as a freelance hacker who flies a quadcopter in order to infiltrate a suspicious corporation. Explore the corporate offices and hack into computers to gain access to the secure areas where you'll obtain your objective. Just be sure to avoid the dangerous "office drones" on your way...

Controls:
FLY2K is designed to be used with a dual stick controller, ideally an XBOX Controller. However, an options menu exists where you can re-map controls to custom inputs to support other devices.

Defaults:
Look & Yaw: Right Joystick
Pitch & Roll: Left Joystick
Throttle Up & Down: Right & Left Triggers
Hack: X Button
Grab: A Button

Credits:

  • Robert Ackley, Programming
  • Andrew Hung, Programming
  • Edward Lu, Programming
  • Josh Soldate, 3D Models & Environment
  • Nic Freeman, 2D Art & 3D Models
  • Tony Astro, Music
  • Kyle Martin, SFX
